lead_paragraph: Brazilian soccer legend Pele will not light the Olympic cauldron at Friday's opening ceremony of the Rio de Janeiro 2016 Olympics, a spokesman for the 75-year-old, three-time soccer World Cup winner said.

headline.print_headline: Pele Will Not Light Olympic Cauldron Due to Muscle Pain: Spokesman
headline.main: Pele Will Not Light Olympic Cauldron Due to Muscle Pain: Spokesman
